item.title: Reboot
item.description: I’m rebooting this site to formally release a project I’ve been working on for the past year. Stay tuned my friends!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Patrick Ting. I’m a software engineer living in the Los Angeles area. I hope you enjoy my work.
